# file-bytes-formatter

This package will return human readable file size in Bytes, Kb,  Mb,  Gb,  Tb,  Pb,  Eb,  Zb,  Yb

## Example



For Node js 
```js

var Fsf = require("file-bytes-formatter")

console.log(Fsf(2020202))

```


For React js 
```js

import Fsf from  "file-bytes-formatter"

console.log(Fsf(2020202))

```

### Output:
```
    1.93 MB
```

    

### Parameters
```
    1.Size (Number)

```
